tool_description:
Mobile Phones API provides RESTful endpoints to fetch list of mobile brands, list of mobile devices within a brand, specification details for each device and a search endpoint. 

We host our api on Cloudflare servers to make sure minimal latency with its edge technology and 100s of server across the globe. Edge computing is a networking philosophy focused on bringing computing as close to the source of data as possible in order to reduce latency and bandwidth use. In simpler terms, edge compu...
name: Mobile Phones
title: Mobile Phones

api_list.name: listBrands
api_list.description: You can get a list of all mobile phone brands using this endpoint
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://mobile-phones2.p.rapidapi.com/brands"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "mobile-phones2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://mobile-phones2.p.rapidapi.com/brands"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "mobile-phones2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
